name: The Deadly Dawn (AWildMartian)
description:
Demo out now!

The year is 2006. You are a lonely college student looking for companionship, but no matter which path you choose, you'll end up finding more than you bargained for...

(The Deadly Dawn is the first part of The Deadly Chronicles worldbuilding project.)

This game is rated 17+ for explicit sexual language, violence, suicide mention, and various horror themes.

"So tell me if you've heard this one before... Two serial killers walk into a bar..."

Don't trust your eyes...
